column5: That was the trio out on Lady S, this morning, hunting for perch. crappieperchhunter, BigCliff, and yours truly, got out for our annual perch slaying session. Good friends. Some laughs. Despite the morning showers it was even a nice day out. The perch weren't too co-operative, but we still managed a few good feeds.  My sink before the carnage began.   We really need to do this more often.
Now thats what its all about !!!! Glad you guys got out and enjoyed the day.
Nice catch, maybe this weekend coming.
well done guys !! looks like it was a blast....a great feed too...

Like I said the bite has been off this fall in there. And the day didn't start off great with that rain  But the skies cleared and we finally found some perch willing to bite.  The 20 incher eluded us again  ...but as always I enjoyed the day and the company.
A fine perch festival for sure! I'm glad to see Cliff out there with the gang too! Wonderful.
Awesome Bruce    Sharing a tub amongst friends and getting into a feed of  perch.... Doesn't get much better than that
Yummm, looks great.  Glad you all had a good time
Nice to see members getting out. Those baskets are holding some real nice perch.
